text: Arieh "Arik" Einstein (January 3, 1939 - November 26, 2013) was a popular Israel singer, songwriter, actor, and screenwriter. Einstein was born in Tel Aviv, Mandatory Palestine. On 26 November 2013 in Tel Aviv, Israel, Einstein died age 74 after a ruptured thoracic aortic aneurysm. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1939 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Israeli movie actors Category:Singers from Tel Aviv Category:Jewish Israeli actors Category:Jewish Israeli musicians Category:Actors from Tel Aviv Category:Israeli screenwriters
title: Arik Einstein
